body.value:
@concat('grant_type=client_credentials',
'&resource=https://eventhubs.azure.net',
'&client_id=',
activity('Web Get AKV Client ID').output.value,
'&client_secret=',
activity('Web Get AKV Secret').output.value
)

@concat('{',
'"ABFSPath": "', pipeline().parameters.ABFSPath, '", ',
'"DataEntityActivityRunID": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityActivityRunID, '", ',
'"DataEntityActivityType": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityActivityType, '", ',
'"DataEntityActivityName": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityActivityName, '", ',
'"DataEntityStartDateTime": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityStartDateTime, '", ',
'"DataEntityEndDateTime": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityEndDateTime, '", ',
'"DataEntityExecutionStatus": "', variables('Status'), '", ',
'"DataEntityLakehouseID": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityLakehouseID, '", ',
'"DataEntityLakehouseName": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityLakehouseName, '", ',
'"DataEntityLoadType": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityLoadType, '", ',
'"DataEntityName": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityName, '", ',
'"DataEntityNameSpace": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityNameSpace, '", ',
'"DataEntityWorkspaceID": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityWorkspaceID, '", ',
'"DataEntityWorkspaceName": "', pipeline().parameters.DataEntityWorkspaceName, '", ',
'"DeleteCount": "', pipeline().parameters.DeleteCount, '", ',
'"FileName": "', pipeline().parameters.FileName, '", ',
'"FileNameWithExt": "', pipeline().parameters.FileNameWithExt, '", ',
'"FlowType": "', pipeline().parameters.FlowType, '", ',
'"InsertCount": "', pipeline().parameters.InsertCount, '", ',
'"ItemRunID": "', pipeline().parameters.ItemRunID, '", ',
'"MaxWatermark": "', pipeline().parameters.MaxWatermark, '", ',
'"RelativePath": "', pipeline().parameters.RelativePath, '", ',
'"RowsCopied": "', pipeline().parameters.RowsCopied, '", ',
'"RowsRead": "', pipeline().parameters.RowsRead, '", ',
'"UpdateCount": "', pipeline().parameters.UpdateCount, '", ',
'"CopyDuration": "', pipeline().parameters.CopyDuration, '", ',
'"FilesRead": "', pipeline().parameters.FilesRead, '", ',
'"FilesWritten": "', pipeline().parameters.FilesWritten, '", ',
'"CreatedBy": "', pipeline().parameters.CreatedBy, '", ',
'"CreatedDateTime": "', pipeline().parameters.CreatedDateTime, '", ',
'"ExecutionErrorMessage": "', replace(replace(replace(pipeline().parameters.ExecutionErrorMessage, '\r', '\\r'), '\n', '\\n'), '\\', '\\\\'), '", ',
'"IntegrationGroupKey": "', pipeline().parameters.IntegrationGroupKey, '", ',
'"IntegrationTaskKey": "', pipeline().parameters.IntegrationTaskKey, '", ',
'"RelatedIntegrationTaskKey": "', pipeline().parameters.RelatedIntegrationTaskKey, '"',
'}')
